TextLibrary.Text: Sunspear
Who are you?
Who are you?
Who are you?
Who are you?
My name is Sunspear. Tauron sent me to guide you in your search for the pieces of Sartek.

No offense Sunspear, but aren't you a little old to be traveling all over the Realms of War?
No offense Sunspear, but aren't you a little old to be traveling all over the Realms of War?
No offense Sunspear, but aren't you a little old to be traveling all over the Realms of War?
No offense Sunspear, but aren't you a little old to be traveling all over the Realms of War?
Where you see age, Tauron sees wisdom. You are already a mighty warrior. I think you need my advice more than you need my spear.

Very well. What's our first task?
Very well. What's our first task?
Very well. What's our first task?
Very well. What's our first task?
In the city of Tusk, to the north, the Horns of Sartek are kept. We must travel there and challenge the local tribe for them.
